name: Earth Solutions Pvt Ltd
overview:
“Arth” in Sanskrit means ”purpose, cause, motive, meaning, notion and finance.” We have chosen our name very carefully as we strive to do meaningful business and provide solutions using electronic medium.

eArth Solutions is a one stop shop for all your web needs. eArth Solutions team of experienced and expert software engineers are ready to work with you to achieve your business goals. Our unique competence in various technologies enables us to deliver integrated, scalable, and robust solutions with the optimal cost/performance ratio.

At eArth Solutions, Both IT services and product development are integral part of the company’s success. Our services include technology consulting, software design, development and delivery for our customers. Product development helps build technical expertise, innovations and the required culture.

eArth Solutions constantly works towards improving and enhancing internet, embellish it with inventive, eye-catching and user friendly web pages and sites. We help our clients, to communicate better, and find the right strategy for their business needs by offering custom web solutions. In Web Development, we offer services such as Website Designing, Web Apps and Enterprise Portal development, Database designing, Domain name registration and website hosting and open source software customization.

Mobile applications are the future for today’s businesses. Our Mobile Application development team has developed high quality mobile apps with customized user interfaces for iPhone, Blackberry and Google Android.

With more and more businesses competing for Internet user attention, it is becoming increasingly hard to appear among the top in search results. Earth Solutions internet marketing includes SEO, SEM, SMO, SMM and analytics.

eArth Solutions is focused on creating engaging, quality, usable Social Apps for the Web, Facebook, Twitter and other similar environments.
